Model.Cards.DealCard

  • Uses of DealCard in Controller

    Methods in Controller that return DealCard
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    DealCard
    Controller.drawDealCard()
    Transformer: Draws a deal card from the deck, calls the gui to show the card that was drawn to the players and then if the player decides to buy it the card is returned, else it is added to the removed deal cards deck and null is returned
    postcondition: The deal card has been drawn, shown to the players and the player decides what to do with the card.
    Methods in Controller with parameters of type DealCard
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    Controller.buyerCardSelected​(DealCard selected)
    Transformer: Is called by the CardInventoryUI after a player has selected a deal card to sell, the player is given his money and the sold deal card is added to the removed deal cards deck.

    Method

    Player.addCard​(DealCard card)
    transformer: adds a card to the inventory of the player
    precondition: the card is not null
    postcondition: the card has been added

    transformer: adds a card to the inventory of the player
    precondition: the card is not null
    postcondition: the card has been added

    CardInventoryUI​(ArrayList<DealCard> inventory)
